thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 3 of 227
thread.title: Shannon Williams
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Shannon Williams

author: Shannon Williams
title: Shannon Williams
text: This is my third time purchasing furniture from Gardner White.. Each and every time I've had a great experience with the service guys.. The guys were very fast and efficient with setting up my sectional today. They made sure I was satisfied where they put it and how it was set up. Always professional, and polite.. Keep up the good work guys..
